Traits.Name: Phasing
Traits.Description: Can ignore obstruction and pass through, but not end your turn in, terrain or characters.

Traits.Name: Living Lightning
Traits.Description: Electrifies foes it moves through. Foes that are already electrified take 2 damage, but only the first time on a turn.

Actions.Name: Sap Vitality
Actions.Description: The Spark ghast deals [D] to an adjacent character.
Actions.Effect: Roll a d6. On a 5+, it deals [D] again, and repeat this effect. This becomes 3+ if the character has any amount of vigor.
